roleset.name: attach, again

example.name: args 0, 1,2
example.text: So [the US and Europe]-1 are overjoyed in the end and can not help but to fittingly yet sarcastically reaffix China with the title of " Origin of Stupid Money " , just like European designer of the CCTV " Big Pants " building ,
example.arg: with the title of " Origin of Stupid Money "
just like European designer of the CCTV " Big Pants " building

roleset.note: REAFFIX-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Relation to 'affix.01'. (from reaffix.01-v)
